author: Ursula Perano
title: 10 times Trump and his administration were warned about the coronavirus threat
description: President Trump's tone on the coronavirus pandemic has dramatically shifted in the last month as the illness has swept across the U.S., which has now reported more confirmed cases than any country in the world. Why it matters: Reporting from Axios, the New Yo…
content:
